acorn_grove_0.intro: You wake up in an acorn grove, seemingly smaller than usual.

joe_hardy.squirrels: **You show Joe the squirrels.** Oh, those are cute babies...

chip_the_squirrel.attack: **Chip the Squirrel lunges at your face.**
chip_the_squirrel.inspect: **You stare a chip the squirrel, chip the squirrel stares back.**

elephant_in_the_room.interact: Take this sealed, food-safe jar of peanut butter
elephant_in_the_room.attack: **The elephant will no longer give you peanut butter**
elephant_in_the_room.inspect: It seems like nobody else in the room can see the elephant...
